name: LUASTime
0:
”Alexa, open luas time”
”Alexa, ask luas time for Sandyford trams schedule”
”Alexa, ask luas time for St. Stephen's Green”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: luas time
des:
This is an Unofficial Skill of the LUAS, Dublin's Tram network. The skill provides forecasts of trams arrivals at each stop.
It has never been quicker or easier to get the next LUAS times!
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
